Verses: 1 dhevane, Engal Pidhaakkaludaiya Naatkalaagiya Poorvanaatkalil Neer Nadappiththa Kiriyaigalai Avargal Engalukku Ariviththaargal; Avaigalai Engal Kaadhugalaal Kettom.
2 dhevareer Ummudaiya Kaiyinaale Jaadhigalaith Thuraththi, Ivargalai Naatti; Janangalaith Thunpappaduththi, Ivargalaip Paravappannineer.

3 avargal Thangal Pattayaththaal Dhesaththaik Kattikkollavillai; Avargal Puyamum Avargalai Ratchikkavillai; Neer Avargalmel Piriyamaayirundhapadiyaal, Ummudaiya Valadhukaramum, Ummudaiya Puyamum, Ummudaiya Mugaththin Piragaasamum Avargalai Ratchiththadhu.
4 dhevane, Neer En Raajaa; Yaakkobukku Ratchippaik Kattalaiyidum.
5 ummaale Engal Saththurukkalaik Keezhe Vizhaththaakki, Engalukku Virodhamaai Ezhumbugiravargalai Ummudaiya Naamaththinaal Midhippom.
6 en Villai Naan Namben; En Pattayam Ennai Ratchippadhillai.
7 neere Engal Saththurukkalinindru Engalai Ratchiththu, Engalaip Pagaikkiravargalai Vetkappaduththugireer.
8 dhevanukkul Niththam Menmai Paaraattuvom; Umadhu Naamaththai Endrendraikkum Thudhippom. (selaa.)
9 neer Engalaith Thallivittu, Naanappannugireer; Engal Senaigaludane Sellaadhirukkireer.
10 saththuruvukku Naangal Idaindhu Pinnittuth Thirumpippogap Pannugireer; Engal Pagaignar Thangalukkendru Engalaik Kollaiyidugiraargal.
11 neer Engalai Aadugalaippola Iraiyaaga Oppukkoduththu, Jaadhigalukkulle Engalaich Sidharadikkireer.
12 neer Ummudaiya Janangalai Ilavasamaaga Virkireer; Avargal Kirayaththinaal Umakku Laabamillaiye.
13 engal Ayalaarukku Engalai Nindhaiyaagavum, Engal Sutruppuraththaarukkup Pariyaasamum Sakkandhamumaagavum Vaikkireer.
14 naangal Jaadhigalukkulle Pazhamozhiyaayirukkavum, Janangal Engalaikkuriththuth Thalaithulukkavum Seygireer.
15 nindhiththuth Thooshikkiravanudaiya Saththaththinimiththamum, Saththuruvinimiththamum, Pazhivaangugiravanimiththamum,
16 en Lachchai Niththam Enakku Munbaaga Irukkiradhu; En Mugaththin Vetkam Ennai Moodugiradhu.
17 ivaiyellaam Engalmel Vandhirundhum, Ummai Naangal Marakkavum Illai, Ummudaiya Udanpadikkaikkuth Thurogampannavum Illai.
18 neer Engalai Valusarppangalulla Idaththile Norukki, Marana Irulinaale Engalai Moodiyirundhum,
19 engal Irudhayam Pinvaangavum Illai, Engal Kaaladi Ummudaiya Paadhaiyai Vittu Vilagavum Illai.
20 naangal Engal Dhevanudaiya Naamaththai Marandhu, Anniyadhevanai Nokkik Kaiyeduththirundhomaanaal,
21 dhevan Adhai Aaraaindhu, Visaariyaadhiruppaaro? Irudhayaththin Andharangangalai Avar Arindhirukkiraare.
22 umadhu Nimiththam Enneramum Kollappadugirom; Adikkappadum Aadugalaippola Ennappadugirom.
23 aandavare, Vizhiththukkollum; En Niththirai Pannugireer? Ezhundharulum, Engalai Endraikkum Thallividaadhirum.
24 en Ummudaiya Mugaththai Maraiththu, Engal Sirumaiyaiyum Engal Nerukkaththaiyum Marandhuvidugireer?
25 engal Aaththumaa Puzhudhimattum Thaazhndhirukkiradhu; Engal Vayiru Tharaiyodu Ottiyirukkiradhu.
26 engalukku Oththaasaiyaaga Ezhundharulum; Ummudaiya Kirubaiyinimiththam Engalai Meettuvitum.
